title: Les Recidivists
description: Two years following the events of Chance Assassin, Frank and Vincent are living in France, struggling with retirement. And with each other. When someone from Frank's past shows up and threatens to bring his personal and professional lives together with a bang, it's up to them to find out who ordered the hit and take them out first. Things may not be what they seem, but they may be exactly what Frank and Vincent need.Told in multiple points of view, Les Recidivists takes you deeper into the world or assassinations, art dealers, and a new romance.
author: Nicole  Castle
